sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Bug">93aac8361bc154908ed631d7dc4bcb26</category> <github_id>26</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/26</github_url> <message>There is a Condition/On Click field on Client script table. Per HI ticket, the field is not in use. There is no documentation because this was never usable.  So in essence, this is a ServiceNow meme "Don't know what it does but I am scared to delete"  Credits: ServiceNow Community Question.</message> <number>TIL0001019</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 15:55:25</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ddb4133d1b3894108ed631d7dc4bcbba</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>Useless Client Script Field</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
